website_summaries.verdict: Extremely comfortable golf shoe that will keep your feet feeling cool all day.
pros: Shoe uses perforations across the sides and top to deliver airflow to your feet
Rubber sole has some give to it for added comfort
Low profile cleat lasts a long time and resists abrasion
cons: Sizes tend to run a little small, and the heel cup will be tight for some

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf shoes! Best I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't just the best golf shoes I've owned, they are some of the best of ANY shoes. Super comfortable, quality materials, and easy to clean. The main reason for the purchase was for hot weather. Any other golf shoes have felt like foot ovens in the summer. Honestly in 105*, my feet were no hotter than the rest of me after 18 holes. Take the average size of your street shoes to order. They felt slightly snug right out of the box, but wore in nicely. You don't want golf shoes to fit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes that look great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the money. They fit as expected and are very comfortable. I haven’t had the chance to test the waterproofing, but if they’re anything like my previous Puma golf shoes, I don’t have any concerns. Some people are wondering if they are heavy after seeing the pictures. I can confirm that they are NOT heavy. They are actually pretty light. I’m very happy with these overall.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: After 4 mo. SPLIT AND LEAKING!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful golf shoes. BUT... Gave these to my husband for Christmas. He is a walker. Extremely comfy and no break-in period. It is now May - 4 1/2 months into use - and they are splitting on the sole and leaking there and around the edges. The 2 year waterproof warranty isn't so wonderful or useful if you can't even get a year or two's use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but sizing is too big and the heel is too low.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 in Puma sneakers and ordered a size 10 in these and they were 1/2 size too big-meaning too long. The back has a low and firm to stiff feel that felt aggravating just above the heel. They are very nicely made shoes that are solid construction, comfortable except for the low heel portion, and my feet don't get hot in them. I ended returning them due to the heel issue and the size being to large and didn't feel like guessing what size to order next so I just ordered a pair of Adidas shoes instead that were the same as my previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cybergor3

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but look great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shoe - looks great. I got it delivered in the white/grey. Unfortunately, the D width was very narrow. The toe on this shoe is somewhat pointed so if you have even slightly wide feet they will squeeze your toes. Other than that, they are a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Cooling tech works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: 96 degree day, heat index of 106 in Houston. My feet stayed normal temperature. Not hot, not cold. Did not notice the temperature at all in my feet, and no blisters. They are comfortable, with good low profile traction. The "Outlast" cooling tech works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Stability
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has had spikeless shoes for a few years, I decided to go back and grab a pair of spikes. Enter the Titantour. I'd tried them on previously and knew they were a great fit, but I had no idea they'd be as comfortable walking 18 as they are. Stability is exactly what I was looking for, and fit is spot on, although a half-size smaller than what I wear in Nike. Pick these shoes up while you can, and if you can't find them, the new Ignites are also a great option, and might be even more comfortable, somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Horne

customer_reviews.title: My second pair 0f these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I hope they will be as good as the first pair I used
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Puma Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe right out of the box. Great value for the price. I play in the early morning dew. My feet stay dry and I am comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JWight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have puma bio fusion, bio fusion lite , and the titan tour ignite. These are the 2nd pair of Puma titan tour golf shoes I have and they fit just right. 10d medium. Solid shoe highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 pairs of Puma shoes, and this one has the cheapest shoelaces have ever seen !!!
customer_reviews.author: martin J. lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a very cool finish to them. Look almost metallic.
customer_reviews.author: SE Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Puma shoe. They're super comfortable and I'd buy every color available if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  Davila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes. Very comfortable with a stable fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Very comfortable with a stable fit. First pair of Puma. Always wore FJ or Adidas. Took straight out of the box for 18 holes and a practice session. More stable than my other shoes. Excellent value for the $. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Heel cup on shoes is small. Causes uncomfortable rubbing ...
customer_reviews.text: Heel cup on shoes is small. Causes uncomfortable rubbing. Will cause blisters. Decided to keep my old footjoys and replace the soft spikes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. Wore them the first time yesterday and the fit and comfort was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just terrific shoes so far. Very light and comfortable, and seem to be well made. The traction is really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe after figuring out correct size.
customer_reviews.text: It's my experience that Puma shoes run .5 - 1 US size smaller than other brands. I wear US 9.5 - 10 in other brands and had to move into a 10.5 for Puma. Once I got the correct size, I love my new Titantour golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes ever worn. Have worn in warm weather and feet don't get hot. Very comfortable and happy with purchase. Have played 4 rounds with them.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, well made, fit as expected, and you get more shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Played 2 rounds with this pair. holding up very well. Worn them in the sand and in the mud (working on the golf game) but these shoes hold up. They come with yellow laces too! Very good looking shoe. Can't comment on durability since I have only played 36 holes in these. I payed more for my previous pair of adidas golf shoes and these look way better and feel more solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Notman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf shoes. My husband loves them (this is his 3rd or 4th pair of the same style, different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Super comfortable and look great. Excellent grip with no sliding or movement when you are teeing off.
customer_reviews.author: Owen824

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them on go course yet. Tried them on, walked around, that's it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and Well Made Golf Shoes.. Looking to get another pair of a different style and color
customer_reviews.author: Philip C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at a good price. The fit was as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Flory

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Puma makes the best golf shoe. These are my 3rd pair of pumas. There the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Burns

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe. Very comfortable from day one. Easily walk 18. Look terrific and preform well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: they keep the feet comfortable and supported
customer_reviews.text: sick kicks, they keep the feet comfortable and supported. They have space technology!
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Pure excellence
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. I love the athletic look that they have.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Weiser

customer_reviews.title: PUMA Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Besides Puma Product, I have to say that Trader Golf backs up there products. I truly thx you for the warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and no break in time needed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and no break in time needed. I normally wear a size 10 in Puma shoes, so I went with a Size 10. Fit was perfect. I just played my first round of 18 with these shoes and I can honestly say they are the most comfortable golf shoes I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort & support
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes right out the box for four rounds of golf in three days. Great comfort & support, style. Purchased white/grey, then purchased flash/black, which are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: rdpeez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes provide excellent grip, and support, but is also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking. Material is great. Might fit a little bigger than in used too but overall great shoe
customer_reviews.author: James LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: These are one of the best golf shoes on the market today
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best golf shoes on the market today, They are very comfortable for a full round of golf even walking 18 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were comfortable right out of the box. I played 5 days in a row and feet felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of golf shoes. Comfort right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great top-of-the-line golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoes with a nice stable base. Wore them in very wet conditions and my feet stayed dry all day. Bought a pair of foot Joy DNAs around the same time and like these much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Szekeres

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of comfort, support and relatively light weight.
customer_reviews.text: They fit me well and felt fairly light while at the same time seeming substantial with good support and a solid foundation. I played 18 holes out of the box and they performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Hole-in-one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband and he loves them. He says they are the most comfortable golf shoes he has ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Light but plenty of support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light but plenty of support. Looking forward to gaming these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ed murphy

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was super comfortable. Have several pairs of Pumas and these ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was super comfortable. Have several pairs of Pumas and these are the best yet!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Doran

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is my fourth pair of Puma shoes, I have this model in two colors, super comfortable and tremendous style, sold the more cheap PUMA had and me went well the risk, nothing to do with the DNA from footjoy to me felt cheated and only use once and auction them on $100, greetings
customer_reviews.author: Pedro  A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes but toes are a little pointy but still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Titantour Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Lace-up golf shoe featuring perforated panels and signature Formstrip at lateral side
Outlast temperature technology for temperatue regulation
Outsole with stealth sleats for low-profile performance
